articles.author: Brian Donegan
articles.title: Widespread multiday severe weather threat kicks off April in central, eastern US - Fox Weather
articles.description: April typically kicks off the most active three months for tornadoes in the U.S., and this year will be no exception as a widespread multiday severe weather threat is expected to impact tens of millions of Americans in the eastern half of the country between …
